Configuration.Name: CorpComms
Configuration.Description: This configuration creates or updates the resources for the Corporate Comms Site and creates or updates a Corporate Comms subsite.

Web.Title: Corporate Communications
Web.Description: Welcome to the Corporate Communications Site

List.Title: Photos
List.Description: A library created to store images that are used on pages in this site.

AllUsersWebPart.WebPart:
<webParts>
	<webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3">
		<metaData>
			<type name=
"Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ScriptEditorWebPart, Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=15.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" />
			<importErrorMessage>$Resources:core,ImportErrorMessage;</importErrorMessage>
		</metaData>
		<data>
			<properties>
				<property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:core,ScriptEditorWebPartTitle;</property>
				<property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:core,ScriptEditorWebPartDescription;</property>
				<property name="ChromeType" type="chrometype">None</property>
				<property name="Content" type="string"><style type='text/css'>
.fast-forward {
	background: #59176B url('/_catalogs/masterpage/Buzz365/images/ff-arrow.png') no-repeat 15px center;
	color: #FFF;
	padding: 15px;
	position: relative;
}
.fast-forward h3, 
.fast-forward p { margin-left: 45px; }
.fast-forward h3 { margin-bottom: 5px; color: #FFF; font-size: 1.4em; text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: bold; }
.fast-forward p { line-height: 1.4em; }
.fast-forward span {
	background: #59176B url('/_catalogs/masterpage/Buzz365/images/ff-top-corner.png');
	height: 41px;
	width: 41px;
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	top: 0px;
	right: 0px;
}
</style>
<div class="fast-forward">
	<h3>Fast Forward</h3>
	<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet some dummy copy</p>
	<span></span>
</div></property>
			</properties>
		</data>
	</webPart>
</webParts>

<WebPart xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <Title>SharePrice</Title> <FrameType>None</FrameType> <Description></Description> <IsIncluded>true</IsIncluded> <ZoneID>Right</ZoneID> <PartOrder>0</PartOrder> <FrameState>Normal</FrameState> <MissingAssembly>Cannot import this Web Part.</MissingAssembly> <PartImageLarge>/_layouts/15/images/mscontl.gif</PartImageLarge> <IsIncludedFilter /> <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=16.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly> <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName> <ContentLink xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor">~site/SiteAssets/apps/share-price.html</ContentLink> <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor" /> <PartStorage xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor" /> </WebPart>
